paper_title: Eigenvalue estimates for the fractional Laplacian on lattice subgraphs
abstract: We introduce the the fractional Laplacian on a subgraph of a graph with Dirichlet boundary condition. For a lattice graph, we prove the upper and lower estimates for the sum of the first $k$ Dirichlet eigenvalues of the fractional Laplacian, extending the classical results by Li-Yau and Kr√∂ger.
